queries.query: SELECT instructor_id, instructor_name, phone, email, status, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at FROM instructors WHERE status = true
SELECT instructor_id, instructor_name, phone, email, status, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at FROM instructors WHERE status = false
SELECT * FROM instructors WHERE instructor_id = ? AND status = true
INSERT INTO instructors (instructor_name, email, password, phone, status, created_at) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, now())
INSERT INTO instructor_course (instructor_id, course_id, status, created_at) VALUES (?, ?, ?, now())

SELECT c.course_id, c.course_name, c.course_time, c.capacity, c.price, c.status, c.created_at, c.updated_at, c.deleted_at FROM instructor_course ic INNER JOIN courses c on ic.course_id = c.course_id INNER JOIN instructors i on i.instructor_id = ic.instructor_id WHERE ic.instructor_id = ?
UPDATE instructor_course SET status = false, deleted_at = now() WHERE course_id = ?
UPDATE instructor_course SET instructor_id = ?, updated_at = now() WHERE course_id = ?

SELECT i.instructor_id, i.instructor_name, i.phone, i.email, i.status, i.created_at, i.updated_at, i.deleted_at FROM instructors i WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM instructor_course ic WHERE ic.instructor_id = i.instructor_id )
UPDATE instructors SET instructor_name = ?, updated_at = now() WHERE instructor_id = ?
UPDATE instructors SET phone = ?, updated_at = now() WHERE instructor_id = ?
UPDATE instructors SET email = ?, updated_at = now() WHERE instructor_id = ?
UPDATE instructors SET status = ?, deleted_at = now() WHERE instructor_id = ?
SELECT course_id, course_name, course_time, capacity, price, status, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at FROM courses WHERE status = true
SELECT courses_id, courses_name, course_time, capacity, price, status, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at FROM courses WHERE status = false
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE course_id = ?
INSERT INTO courses (course_name, course_time, capacity, price, status, created_at) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, now())
UPDATE courses SET course_name = ?, updated_at = now() WHERE course_id = ?
UPDATE courses SET course_time = ?, updated_at = now() WHERE course_id = ?
UPDATE courses SET capacity = ?, updated_at = now() WHERE course_id = ?
